1680940.name: RPG Maker MZ - Wizards Pack (8 Elements)
1680940.description:
【About this software】

The second DLC package from Y-pot, responsible for most of the default materials for RPG Maker MZ, is now available!

The "Wizard Pack (8 Elements)" for RPG Maker MV/MZ is a collection of graphic materials for "Wizard Characters" and "Magic Effects". The wizard characters come in a wide variety of eight elements (fire, water, wind, lightning, earth, light, darkness, and summoning) and are available in male and female genders.
2 characters from each attribute, a total of 16 unique characters are available.

Also, this pack comes with a set of 60 animation effects, mainly for the eight magic attributes of fire, water, wind, lightning, earth, light, darkness, and summoning. You can make your wizard characters with the effects right away.

You can also summon monsters such as Salamander, Undine, Gnome, Sylph, Plasma, Treant in the default material [enemies] by using summoning magic!

If you've ever thought, "I love magic, but it's too much trouble to create characters and effects for each attribute...", with this, you can easily add a wizard character to your game production!

=========================================================
Contents

・faces: 2 sheets (16 characters）
・picture: 16 sheets (upper body shots）
・full body images: 16 sheet(bonus images）
・characters: 3 sheets (walking 8 characters x2 sheets, lying 16 characters x1 sheet）
・sv_actors: 16 sheets (16 characters）
・enemies: 32 sheets (16 characters x2：effect on / off）
・sv_enemies: 32 sheets (16 characters x2：effect on / off）
・system：4 sheets (bonus images for SV Weapons images）
・effects: 60 effects（fire, ice, thunder, water, earth, wind, light, darkness, summons, others, 6 of each）
・sample project
=========================================================

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series ONLY
* OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
